column5: Hello I am originaly from Orleans Ontario, I lived most of my childhood in Cumberland Ontario about 250 feet from the shore of the Ottawa River, now I live in Gatineau Quebec. I have also worked in Terrace Bay Ontario in 1981, I was in Pembroke for studies in 1983-1984 & loved the Algonquin Park hoping to go back there this summer with my son. I have a 14 foot aluminium boat & a 20 hp motor, a project fiberglass boat of 13.5 ft no motor tought I gave it to my uncle. I am also a deer hunter.  I am in numerous fishing & hunting forums, so do not be surprised if you do not see me often on this forum.
WELCOME.  You say theres other forums???LOL
You've tried the rest....this one's the best. Welcome.
Welcome to the community Puncho !!! Born in Pembroke, Lived in Kingston, Pte Gatineau, Ottawa, Gagetown and now in Montreal.We get arround  Looking forward to your reports   Paul
welcome to the board always good to see another Quebecer join this incredible fishing site.  MTP
